title: Term Object Validation
description: Validation schema for term objects. A term at Cal Poly is commonly called a quarter. If one is not inferrable from a query, assume the present term.

_id.description: the unique identifier for the term object

start.description: the term's start date in simplified ISO 8601: YYYYMMDD (ex. 20240314)

end.description: the term's end date in simplified ISO 8601: YYYYMMDD (ex. 20240314)

buildings.description: an array of building ids associated with the term

colleges.description: an array of college ids associated with the term

path.description: the path to the term's page (useful for end users)
